note.p: Administrator and clergyman. Secretary to diocesan Church of England temperance societies (Lichfield 1874–85, Bath and Wells 1885–95, Lincoln 1895–1907). Author of A practical guide for the formation and management of district and parochial branches of the C.E.T.S. (1876). Ordained, 1886; incumbent of Rand with Fulnetby, 1895–1907; Long Sutton, Lincolnshire, 1907–24.
